snippet.title: Ship of Fools - Official Console Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
The co-op roguelike adventures of Ship of Fools brings its unique blend of 2D exploration and action to consoles later this year. This trailer from the IGN Expo during our Summer of Gaming gives you a look at the combat and RPG elements players can expect from both online and couch co-op.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNSummerOfGaming
